Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 85th overall pick, by Boston in 2016...
Injured on 6/8/2016 with a Fractured Hip, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/27/2016 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/12/2018 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/6/2018, off Alberto Arroyo (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/19/2018, off James Lashley (HOU)...
Traded from Boston to Cincinnati on 2/1/2019 (Going to BOS: SS Santiago Collado, P Juan Cardoso. Going to CIN: 1B Raul Rivera, LF Cedrick Fernandez)...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 5/24/2020 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 7-8 weeks...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/2021, hitting .327 with 9 HR, 24 RBI...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 2/3/2022 (Going to DET: 3B Edward Clinard, 3B Cedrick Fernandez, P Deangelo Montejano, CF Andrew Ruggles, P Thurman Brawley. Going to CIN: P Rodney Schloss)...
